message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  I think it could really benefit your business. I'm asking for $1,600,000 to reflect the immense value it brings.
Alice,  I appreciate your offer, but $1,600,000 is a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for this product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,100,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $1,450,000. This is my best offer and reflects the considerable benefits the product will bring to your business.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $1,450,000 is still above my budget. I'm prepared to offer $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value we both see in this product.
